message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can adjust in future rounds.
You started with a generous offer, but I think I can do better. Let's see if you'll take this one.
You're trying to take advantage of inflation, but I'm not afraid to make a counteroffer. Let's see if you'll take this one.
I'm not willing to give you more than 45% of the original amount. You'll have to do better than that if you want me to accept.
You're trying to lowball me, but I'm not backing down. I'll meet you in the middle, but that's as low as I'll go.
I'm not going to give you the majority, but I'm willing to meet you halfway on the low end. Take it or leave it.
You're not budging, but I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'm hoping you'll see this as a reasonable compromise.
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, but I still think this is a fair split. You're not getting more than 30% of the original amount, so take it or leave it.
I'm not willing to give up more than 50% of the original amount. Let's meet in the middle and see if we can finalize a deal.
